text: Inflation is at a 40-year high and the prices of everyday goods are soaring. It is estimated that inflation will now cost the average American household over $5,000 this year. Americans are hurting in @JoeBiden's America. https://t.co/iSPWTbylbg

I had the privilege of touring Aspell Recovery Center in Madison Co. Aspell provides a compassionate support system to those battling addiction in the West TN community. Thank you to Executive Director Richard Barber, @rhkirkland, and @SenEdJackson for showing me around. https://t.co/RCrtinDnTX

I enjoyed meeting with @WTHealthcare this morning in Madison County. I appreciate hearing from all of you about your operations throughout West Tennessee. You do a great job keeping West Tennesseans healthy. Thank you to President & CEO J.R. Ross and Jimmy Exum for the invite! https://t.co/Eges11rM2p

Today, on the 78th Anniversary of D-Day, I am reminded of all of our brave service members who stormed the beaches of Normandy to protect our freedoms and our liberties. Thank you to the greatest generation for allowing us to live peacefully and securely. https://t.co/elP9nzWOtI

The World Health Organization (WHO) is a corrupt international bureaucracy that isn't working in the interest of the American people. I joined @RepTiffany, @RepublicanStudy Chair @RepJimBanks, & my colleagues to demand that @JoeBiden withdraw from the WHO. https://t.co/TfW64QhRwZ

This morning, I joined @MariaBartiromo on @MorningsMaria to discuss @USTreasury @SecYellen finally admitting she was wrong about inflation being transitory. Americans have been suffering for almost two years due to Biden's reckless spending. https://t.co/QtXShGwIFK
